item.title: 国际刑警组织负责人表示，为了制止滥用“红色通缉令”，国际刑警组织无法采取更多措施
item.description:
Interpol has come a long way in preventing abuse by Russia and others of its "red notice" system where a country asks others to arrest a suspect, and cannot do much more for now to improve it, the agency's head said on Tuesday.翻译:国际刑警组织负责人周二表示，国际刑警组织在防止俄罗斯和其他国家滥用其“红色通缉令”制度方面已经取得了很大进展，该制度是一个国家要求其他国家逮捕嫌疑人的制度，但目前无法采取更多措施来改进这一制度。

Rights groups, legal experts and others have long said countries like Russia and China abuse the red notice system by using it to get political critics arrested abroad.翻译:人权组织、法律专家和其他人士长期以来一直表示，俄罗斯和中国等国家滥用红色通缉令制度，利用该制度在国外逮捕政治批评人士。

Over the years Interpol, the global police coordination body with 195 member states, has increased checks to prevent abusive red notices, and it now screens all requests for a red notice before issuing them. More than 10,000 are issued a year.翻译:多年来，拥有 195 个成员国的全球警察协调机构国际刑警组织加强了检查，以防止滥用红色通缉令，现在它在发出红色通缉令之前会筛选所有红色通缉令请求。每年发行超过10,000份。

"If I got good advice for example from NGOs (on) what else I can do, I would implement that," Interpol Secretary General Juergen Stock told Reuters in an interview on the margins of his organisation's annual General Assembly, which is being held in Vienna this year.翻译:国际刑警组织秘书长尤尔根·斯托克在其组织年度大会间隙接受路透社采访时表示：“如果我从非政府组织那里得到好的建议，比如我还能做什么，我就会付诸实施。”今年维也纳。

Stock, who is German, has another year in his mandate after nine years in the post.翻译:斯托克是德国人，在任职九年后，他的任期还有一年。

"We have a small percentage, maybe 2%, 3% of tricky notices. The overwhelming majority concerns murderers, rapists, drug smugglers and what have you," he said.翻译:“我们收到的棘手通知的比例很小，可能是 2%、3%。绝大多数都涉及谋杀犯、强奸犯、毒品走私犯以及诸如此类的人，”他说。

"Have we made one or the other mistakes perhaps where we had to correct a decision? Yes. I'm not saying it's perfect but I'm saying it's very robust," he said.翻译:“我们是否犯了一个或其他错误，也许我们必须纠正一个决定？是的。我并不是说它是完美的，但我是说它非常稳健，”他说。

Stock avoided naming and shaming individual countries but said Russia is the worst offender. Rights groups have long accused Moscow of filing by far the largest number of abusive requests.翻译:斯托克避免点名和羞辱个别国家，但表示俄罗斯是最严重的罪犯。人权组织长期以来一直指责莫斯科提出了迄今为止数量最多的滥用请求。

Moscow says it follows due legal process and depicts many prominent critics such as jailed opposition leader Alexei Navalny as criminals.翻译:莫斯科表示，它遵循正当的法律程序，并将许多著名的批评者，如被监禁的反对派领导人阿列克谢·纳瓦尔尼描述为罪犯。

"Of course we see geopolitical tensions are rising. Of course we know there is no international definition of terrorism. That is not going away," Stock said, adding that Interpol has increased the number of languages in which it can monitor the "global situation".翻译:斯托克说：“当然，我们看到地缘政治紧张局势正在加剧。当然，我们知道恐怖主义没有国际定义。这种情况不会消失。”他补充说，国际刑警组织已经增加了可以监控“全球局势”的语言数量。 ”。

"Maybe AI (artificial intelligence) will help in the future. We are now also working on implementing AI solutions that are helping us in that monitoring. So the process is continuing but the major cornerstones are established," he said.翻译:“也许人工智能在未来会有所帮助。我们现在也在努力实施人工智能解决方案，帮助我们进行监控。所以这个过程仍在继续，但主要的基石已经建立，”他说。

Reporting by Francois Murphy Editing by Frances Kerry翻译:弗朗索瓦·墨菲报道 弗朗西斯·克里编辑

item.title: 中国Shein申请美国首次公开募股，对投资者胃口构成重大考验 - 消息人士
item.description:
Summary:
  • Shein yet to determine IPO size, valued at over $60 bln in May
  • IPO comes amid challenging markets and U.S. scrutiny
  • Fast-fashion retailers still behind Amazon on sales
翻译:概括：
  • Shein 尚未确定 IPO 规模，5 月份估值超过 600 亿美元
  • IPO 正值充满挑战的市场和美国的审查
  • 快时尚零售商的销售额仍落后于亚马逊

Fashion company Shein has confidentially filed to go public in the United States, according to two sources familiar with the matter, in what is likely to be one of the most valuable China-founded companies to list in New York.翻译:据两位知情人士透露，时装公司 Shein 已秘密申请在美国上市，这可能是在纽约上市的最有价值的中国创办公司之一。

Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan Chase and Morgan Stanley have been hired as lead underwriters on the initial public offering (IPO), and Singapore-based Shein could launch its new share sale some time in 2024, the sources said.翻译:消息人士称，高盛、摩根大通和摩根士丹利已被聘请为首次公开募股 (IPO) 的主承销商，总部位于新加坡的 Shein 可能会在 2024 年的某个时候启动新股发行。

Shein has not determined the size of the deal or the valuation at IPO, the sources said. Bloomberg reported earlier this month it targeted up to $90 billion in the float.翻译:消息人士称，Shein 尚未确定交易规模或 IPO 估值。彭博社本月早些时候报道称，其发行目标为 900 亿美元。

Shein and the banks declined to comment.翻译:Shein 和银行拒绝置评。

The company founded in mainland China in 2012 was valued at more than $60 billion in a May fundraising, down by a third from a funding round last year.翻译:该公司于 2012 年在中国大陆成立，在 5 月份的融资中估值超过 600 亿美元，比去年的融资轮次下降了三分之一。

The most valuable China-founded enterprise to go public in the United States so far is ride-hailing giant Didi Global's (92Sy.MU) debut in 2021 at $68 billion valuation.翻译:迄今为止在美国上市市值最高的中资企业是网约车巨头滴滴出行（92Sy.MU），该公司于 2021 年首次亮相，估值为 680 亿美元。

The fast-fashion giant's move to go public in the U.S. comes as the market for initial public offerings is struggling to rebound after a string of lacklustre stock market debuts.翻译:这家快时尚巨头决定在美国上市之际，首次公开募股(IPO)市场在经历了一系列低迷的股市上市后正艰难反弹。

In recent months there were four major IPOs, and three of them disappointed investors.翻译:近几个月来，共有四起大型IPO，其中三起令投资者感到失望。

Shares of German sandal-maker Birkenstock (BIRK.N), grocery delivery app Instacart (CART.O) and chip designer Arm Holdings dropped below their IPO prices in the days that followed debuts, though Arm's shares are now trading above that price.翻译:德国凉鞋制造商 Birkenstock (BIRK.N) 、杂货配送应用 Instacart (CART.O)和芯片设计商 Arm Holdings 的股价在上市后的几天内均跌破了 IPO 价格，尽管 Arm 的股价目前高于该价格。

"It doesn't strike me as the most opportune time for Shein to come public, but if they need capital the markets are open ... and investor sentiment has been more positive than it was a few weeks ago," said Jason Benowitz, senior portfolio manager at CI Roosevelt.翻译:杰森·贝诺维茨 (Jason Benowitz) 表示：“在我看来，这并不是 Shein 上市的最佳时机，但如果他们需要资金，市场就会开放……而且投资者情绪比几周前更加积极。” CI Roosevelt 的高级投资组合经理。

"When investors can review the financials, I would expect to see pretty strong growth historically ... the key question will be if they can kind of maintain the pace or to continue to gain market share going forward," he said.翻译:他表示：“当投资者能够审视财务状况时，我预计会看到历史上相当强劲的增长……关键问题是他们是否能够保持这种步伐或继续获得未来的市场份额。”

U.S. IPOs have raised about $23.64 billion so far this year, compared with $21.3 billion during the same period last year. In 2021, the comparable number was $300 billion when the IPO market was close to its peak.

SUPPLY CHAINS

Shein had started low-profile roadshows for the float in the U.S., said one of the sources, who declined to be identified due to confidentiality restraints.翻译:一位因保密限制而拒绝透露姓名的消息人士称，Shein 已在美国开始低调路演。

It is not immediately clear if the company has filed with China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC) for the U.S. IPO. Chinese companies need to receive clearance from the regulator before going ahead with their offshore offerings.翻译:目前尚不清楚该公司是否已向中国证监会（CSRC）提交赴美IPO申请。中国公司在进行离岸发行之前需要获得监管机构的许可。

CSRC did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国证监会没有立即回应置评请求。

"As it is a significant and highly disruptive player in the retail space, Shein will attract a lot of investor interest," said GlobalData managing director Neil Saunders.翻译:GlobalData 董事总经理 Neil Saunders 表示：“由于 Shein 是零售领域的重要且极具颠覆性的参与者，因此将吸引大量投资者的兴趣。”

Reuters in July reported that Shein - which attempted to list in the U.S. in 2020 but shelved that plan - has been working with at least three investment banks about a potential IPO.翻译:路透社 7 月报道称，Shein 曾试图于 2020 年在美国上市，但搁置了该计划。该公司一直在与至少三家投资银行就潜在的 IPO 进行合作。

In August, Republican attorneys general from 16 U.S. states asked the Securities and Exchange Commission to audit Shein's supply chain for the alleged use of forced labor ahead of its potential IPO.

'GOOD TIME TO LIST'

Known for its $10 tops and $5 biker shorts, Shein ships the majority of its products directly from China to shoppers by air in individually addressed packages.翻译:Shein 的大部分产品采用独立地址包装，通过空运直接从中国运送给购物者。翻译:Shein 以其 10 美元的上衣和 5 美元的机车短裤而闻名，其大部分产品都通过单独地址的包装直接从中国空运给购物者。

The direct shipping strategy helped the firm avoid unsold inventory piling up in warehouses and avoid import tax in the United States, one of its biggest markets, as it allows the e-tailer to take advantage of the "de minimis" provision that exempts cheap products from tariffs.翻译:直接运输策略帮助该公司避免了未售出的库存堆积在仓库中，并避免了其最大市场之一美国的进口税，因为它允许电子零售商利用免除廉价产品的“最低限度”条款来自关税。

Some critics say the provision allows companies to evade higher tariffs on Chinese goods.翻译:一些批评人士表示，该条款允许企业逃避对中国商品征收的更高关税。

Fast fashion retailers have been gaining popularity in the United States, with Shein taking away market share from the likes of Gap (GPS.N) as shoppers look for fresher styles.翻译:快时尚零售商在美国越来越受欢迎，随着购物者寻求更新鲜的款式，Shein 抢走了 Gap (GPS.N)等品牌的市场份额。

In August, Shein partnered with SPARC Group, a joint venture between Forever 21 owner Authentic Brands (AUTH.N) and mall operator Simon Property (SPG.N), in an attempt to expand their market reach.翻译:8 月，Shein 与 SPARC Group 合作，SPARC Group 是 Forever 21 所有者 Authentic Brands (AUTH.N)和购物中心运营商 Simon Property (SPG.N)的合资企业，试图扩大其市场覆盖范围。

Shein along with Temu.com, however, have not been able to turn shopper visits into sales and are far behind market leader Amazon.com (AMZN.O) on that score.翻译:然而，Shein 和Temu.com 未能将购物者访问转化为销售额，在这一点上远远落后于市场领导者亚马逊(AMZN.O) 。

Sumeet Singh, an analyst at Aequitas Research who publishes on SmartKarma, said big companies like Shein were tapping capital markets due to peaking interest rates and ahead of possible changes in U.S. regulations for small retailers.翻译:Aequitas Research 分析师苏米特·辛格 (Sumeet Singh) 在 SmartKarma 上发表文章，他表示，由于利率达到顶峰，而且美国对小型零售商的监管可能发生变化，像 Shein 这样的大公司正在利用资本市场。

"It's probably as good as it gets for them right now," he said.翻译:“这对他们来说可能是现在最好的了，”他说。

Shein's confidential U.S. IPO filing was first reported by China's Shanghai Securities Journal last week. The Wall Street Journal earlier on Monday confirmed the report citing sources.翻译:中国《上海证券报》上周首次报道了 Shein 的美国 IPO 保密申请。 《华尔街日报》周一早些时候援引消息人士的话说证实了这一报道。

Reporting by Pritam Biswas and Ananya Mariam Rajesh in Bengaluru; Kane Wu in Hong Kong and Anirban Sen in New York; Additional Reporting by Rishabh Jaiswal in Bengaluru, Scott Murdoch in Sydney and Miyoung Kim in Singapore; Editing by Stephen Coates翻译:Pritam Biswas 和 Ananya Mariam Rajesh 在班加罗尔的报道； Kane Wu 在香港，Anirban Sen 在纽约； Rishabh Jaiswal 在班加罗尔、Scott Murdoch 在悉尼和 Miyoung Kim 在新加坡的补充报道；斯蒂芬·科茨编辑

item.title: 随着在线折扣店 Temu 的蓬勃发展，中国拼多多的业绩超出预期
item.description:
Temu parent PDD Holdings (PDD.O) beat third-quarter revenue forecasts on Tuesday as heavy discounting boosted sales across its e-commerce platforms in China and overseas, sending its U.S.-listed shares almost 14% higher in premarket trading.翻译:Temu 母公司 PDD Holdings (PDD.O)周二第三季度收入超出预期，大幅折扣提振了其在中国和海外电子商务平台的销售，导致其在美国上市的股价在盘前交易中上涨近 14%。

PDD, home to Chinese online discount retailer Pinduoduo as well as cross-border platform Temu, has received a big boost from the growing popularity of its international e-commerce arm, which is known for selling $4 earphones and $15 hoodies.翻译:拼多多是中国在线折扣零售商拼多多和跨境平台特木的总部，其国际电子商务部门日益受欢迎，该部门以销售 4 美元的耳机和 15 美元的连帽衫而闻名。

Analysts expect Temu, launched in September last year, to generate more than $16 billion in revenue this year. Since launching in the U.S., Temu is now available in 48 countries, including across Europe and the Middle East, as well as South East Asia and Australia.翻译:分析师预计去年 9 月推出的 Temu 今年将产生超过 160 亿美元的收入。自在美国推出以来，Temu 现已在 48 个国家/地区销售，包括整个欧洲和中东、以及东南亚和澳大利亚。

"PDD's overseas initiative Temu was the major driver for revenue growth," said Xiaoyan Wang, analyst at 86Research, who added that domestic Chinese revenue also outstripped growth at rivals Alibaba (9988.HK) and JD.com (9618.HK) by a "large margin".翻译:86Research 分析师王晓燕表示：“拼多多的海外业务 Temu 是收入增长的主要推动力。”他补充说，中国国内收入的增长也超过了竞争对手阿里巴巴（9988.HK）和京东（9618.HK）的增幅。 “大利润”。

Temu and its rival Shein, which according to sources has confidentially filed to go public in the U.S., have both benefited this year from a cost of living crisis in many countries increasing demand for their low-cost, largely Chinese-made goods.翻译:Temu 及其竞争对手Shein（据消息人士透露，该公司已秘密申请在美国上市）今年都受益于许多国家的生活成本危机，增加了对其低成本、主要是中国制造的商品的需求。

PDD's revenue rose 94% year-on-year to 68.84 billion yuan ($9.62 billion) in the quarter to Sept. 30, compared with an average estimate according to LSEG data of 54.59 billion yuan. The year-earlier result was still impacted by strict COVID-19 curbs in China.翻译:截至 9 月 30 日的季度，拼多多的收入同比增长 94% 至 688.4 亿元人民币（合 96.2 亿美元），而 LSEG 数据的平均预期为 545.9 亿元人民币。去年同期的结果仍受到中国严格的 COVID-19 限制措施的影响。

Deep discounts ahead of the Singles Day shopping event in China helped lift demand for products on Pinduoduo, which was able to leverage its reputation for low prices to capture more value-conscious consumers in the world's second-largest economy.翻译:中国双十一购物活动之前的大幅折扣帮助提升了拼多多产品的需求，拼多多能够利用其低价声誉吸引世界第二大经济体中更多注重价值的消费者。

Executives said on a post-earnings call with analysts that 620 billion users took part in its subsidies program over the Singles Day festival period.翻译:高管们在财报后与分析师举行的电话会议上表示，双十一期间有 6200 亿用户参与了其补贴计划。

China's e-commerce giants have all this year taken aim at the value-driven sector that has always been Pinduoduo's strong suit.翻译:今年以来，中国电商巨头纷纷瞄准拼多多一直以来的强项价值驱动领域。

"This year is a year of recovery but also a year of heightened competition ... and we are not surprised to see industry peers are increasing investment to increase competition," said co-CEO Zhao Jiazhen.翻译:“今年是复苏的一年，也是竞争加剧的一年……看到行业同行加大投资以加剧竞争，我们并不感到惊讶，”联席首席执行官赵家珍表示。

While PDD's focus will continue to be value for consumers, he added, it is also focussing on high quality to increase trust in PDD's platforms so consumers feel comfortable buying a wider range of goods.翻译:他补充说，虽然拼多多的重点将继续是为消费者提供价值，但它也注重高品质，以增加对拼多多平台的信任，让消费者放心地购买更广泛的商品。

Though the retail market in China was initially expected to bounce back strongly when strict COVID-19 curbs were lifted, Chinese consumers have remained cautious as the country faces more headwinds, including a property market downturn and record youth unemployment.翻译:尽管最初预计在严格的 COVID-19 限制措施解除后，中国零售市场将强劲反弹，但由于中国面临更多阻力，包括房地产市场低迷和创纪录的青年失业率，中国消费者仍保持谨慎态度。

Chinese retail sales in September rose 5.5% following 4.6% growth in August.翻译:继 8 月份增长 4.6%之后，9 月份中国零售额增长 5.5%。

PDD's net income attributable to ordinary shareholders rose to 15.54 billion yuan in the third quarter, from 10.59 billion yuan a year earlier.翻译:第三季度拼多多归属于普通股股东的净利润从去年同期的105.9亿元增至155.4亿元。

($1 = 7.1532 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1532 人民币）

item.title: 中国美团第四季度外卖收入增长放缓
item.description:
China's Meituan (3690.HK) on Tuesday said it expects fourth-quarter revenue growth for its core food delivery business to slow versus the preceding quarter, as persistent consumer caution and warmer weather for the winter season hits orders.翻译:中国美团点评（3690.HK）周二表示，由于消费者持续谨慎以及冬季天气转暖影响订单，预计其核心食品配送业务第四季度收入增长将较上一季度放缓。

Deliveries will also likely decline versus the same period last year, Meituan Chief Financial Officer Chen Shaohui said, as demand in the fourth quarter last year was helped by customers still grappling with curbs on movement caused by China's COVID policy, placing larger orders over longer distances.翻译:美团点评首席财务官陈少辉表示，与去年同期相比，交付量也可能会下降，因为去年第四季度的需求得益于仍在努力应对中国新冠疫情政策造成的出行限制的客户，他们在更远的距离下了大量订单。

He said he expects a similar trend for its non-food delivery service Meituan Instashopping.翻译:他表示，他预计其非食品配送服务美团Instashopping也会出现类似的趋势。

"We are stepping up our marketing efforts to stimulate demand in the current consumption environment," he said, adding that this would include higher subsidies.翻译:他说：“我们正在加大营销力度，以刺激当前消费环境下的需求。”他补充说，这将包括提高补贴。

The comments come as demand in the world's second-largest economy remains lacklustre, with China's post-pandemic economic recovery losing steam in recent months. Meituan CEO Wang Xing previously flagged a tougher third quarter for the food delivery business due to macroeconomic headwinds.翻译:此番言论发表之际，全球第二大经济体的需求依然低迷，中国疫情后的经济复苏近几个月失去动力。美团点评首席执行官王兴此前曾表示，由于宏观经济不利因素，外卖业务第三季度将更加艰难。

Asked about whether the company will consider a share buyback, Wang said the company's board had authorised one of up to $1 billion. However, a buyback would depend on Meituan's cash position due to plans to invest in new initiatives and explore overseas investments, he said.翻译:当被问及公司是否会考虑进行股票回购时，王表示，公司董事会已授权其中一项高达 10 亿美元的回购。不过，他表示，由于美团计划投资新项目和探索海外投资，因此回购将取决于美团的现金状况。

Shares in Meituan, China's largest food delivery provider ahead of Aliaba's Ele.me, have fallen to their lowest level since 2020, having declined 5.2% on Tuesday before its earnings.翻译:美团是中国最大的食品配送提供商，领先于阿里旗下的饿了么，其股价已跌至 2020 年以来的最低水平，周二发布财报前下跌 5.2%。

The platform, whose app provides services such as bike sharing, ticket booking and maps, earlier in the day posted a bigger-than-expected 22.1% rise in third-quarter revenue to 76.47 billion yuan ($10.69 billion) versus 62.62 billion yuan in the same period a year earlier.翻译:该平台的应用程序提供自行车共享、票务预订和地图等服务，当天早些时候公布第三季度收入增长 22.1%，达到 764.7 亿元人民币（合 106.9 亿美元），而去年同期为 626.2 亿元人民币。一年前的同一时期。

The result compared with the 75.59 billion average of 15 analyst estimates compiled by LSEG.翻译:该结果与 LSEG 编制的 15 名分析师平均预期 755.9 亿美元进行了比较。

Meituan posted a profit of 3.59 billion yuan versus profit of 1.22 billion yuan a year earlier.翻译:美团点评净利润为35.9亿元人民币，而去年同期为12.2亿元人民币。

Quarterly revenue from core local commerce, which includes food delivery as well as Meituan Instashopping, rose 24.5% to 57.69 billion yuan.翻译:包括外卖和美团Instashopping在内的核心本地商业的季度收入增长24.5%，达到576.9亿元人民币。

Revenue from in-store, hotel booking, and travel sector businesses benefited from a domestic travel rebound over the summer with transaction volume rising 90% year on year.翻译:到店、酒店预订、旅游板块业务收入受益于夏季国内旅游反弹，交易量同比增长90%。

Meituan in May expanded beyond mainland China to Hong Kong with new food delivery business KeeTa, and is reportedly eyeing further international expansion, possibly to Southeast Asia.翻译:美团5月通过新的食品配送业务KeeTa将业务从中国大陆扩展到香港，据报道，美团正在考虑进一步国际扩张，可能会扩展到东南亚。

item.title: 独家：中国支付宝将以近4亿美元出售其在印度Zomato的股份
item.description:
Chinese payments group Alipay plans to sell its 3.4% stake in Indian food delivery giant Zomato (ZOMT.NS) for nearly $400 million through block deals on Indian stock exchanges, according to three sources and a Reuters review of the deal's term sheet.翻译:据三位消息人士和路透社对交易条款清单的审查，中国支付集团支付宝计划通过印度证券交易所的大宗交易，以近 4 亿美元的价格出售其持有的印度食品配送巨头 Zomato (ZOMT.NS) 3.4% 的股份。

Alipay, owned by Ant Group, will offload its entire 3.44% stake in the deal, the term sheet seen by Reuters showed.翻译:路透社看到的条款清单显示，蚂蚁集团旗下的支付宝将出售其在此次交易中全部 3.44% 的股份。

Bank of America and Morgan Stanley are advisers on the deal, which is likely to be executed later this week on Indian exchanges, said the three sources, who declined to be named as the plan is private.翻译:这三位消息人士表示，美国银行和摩根士丹利是该交易的顾问，该交易可能于本周晚些时候在印度交易所执行。由于该计划是私人的，因此他们拒绝透露姓名。

Zomato, Bank of America and Morgan Stanley did not immediately respond to a request for comment. Alipay also did not respond outside regular business hours.翻译:Zomato、美国银行和摩根士丹利没有立即回应置评请求。支付宝在正常营业时间之外也没有做出回应。

Zomato shares have surged more than 90% this year, after falling by more than half in 2022 when tech stocks struggled around the world.翻译:Zomato 股价在 2022 年全球科技股陷入困境时下跌了一半以上，但今年已飙升超过 90%。

Alipay "wants to cash out ... the (market) timing is good," said the first source, referring to the rapid rise in Zomato's shares in recent months.翻译:第一位消息人士表示，支付宝“想要套现……（市场）时机很好”，他指的是近几个月来 Zomato 股价的快速上涨。

The block deals are set to be executed at 111.28 rupees per share, a 2.2% discount to Zomato's close on Tuesday, the term sheet said.翻译:条款清单称，大宗交易将以每股 111.28 卢比的价格执行，较 Zomato 周二收盘价折让 2.2%。

In October, Japan's SoftBank (9984.T) sold a 1.1% stake in Zomato, which is India's biggest food delivery service. Demand for online ordering has rapidly grown in recent years, prompting companies like Zomato to aggressively expand.翻译:10月，日本软银（9984.T）出售了印度最大的食品配送服务公司Zomato 1.1%的股份。近年来，在线订购的需求迅速增长，促使 Zomato 等公司积极扩张。

Alipay's exit from Zomato comes as other Chinese investors have been paring their stakes in Indian companies. In August, China's Antfin sold a 10.3% stake in Indian financial giant Paytm (PAYT.NS).翻译:支付宝退出 Zomato 之际，其他中国投资者纷纷减持印度公司的股份。 8月，中国Antfin 出售了印度金融巨头Paytm （PAYT.NS） 10.3%的股份。

Tech stocks such as Zomato have staged a rebound after a drubbing last year amid a market meltdown, when investors also raised questions about sky-high valuations of some Indian startups that had made their stock market debut in recent years.翻译:Zomato 等科技股在经历了去年市场崩盘的惨败后现已实现反弹，当时投资者还对一些近年来首次在股市首次亮相的印度初创公司的天价估值提出了质疑。

Reporting by M. Sriram; Editing by Aditya Kalra and Susan Fenton翻译:M. Sriram 报道； Aditya Kalra 和 Susan Fenton 编辑
item.author: M. Sriram

item.title: 中国恒大集团对母公司提起法律诉讼
item.description:
Evergrande Property Services Group (6666.HK) said on Tuesday one of its units had commenced legal proceedings against Hengda Real Estate Group Company and embattled developer China Evergrande (3333.HK), among others.翻译:恒大物业服务集团（6666.HK）周二表示，其旗下之一已对恒大地产集团公司和陷入困境的开发商中国恒大（3333.HK）等公司提起法律诉讼。

The unit, Jinbi Property Management Company, has commenced the proceedings for the recovery of about 2 billion yuan ($279.60 million) deposit certificate pledge guarantees.翻译:该单位金碧物业管理公司已启动追回约20亿元人民币（2.796亿美元）存单质押担保的程序。

The proceedings are related to the enforcement of Evergrande Property Services' deposit pledge of about 13.4 billion yuan.翻译:该诉讼涉及恒大物业约134亿元存款质押的执行。

Jinbi Property has also commenced legal proceedings against Shenzhen Qihang Metals Materials Company, Guizhou Guangjuyuan Real Estate Development and Hengda Real Estate Group Guiyang Property.翻译:金碧置业还对深圳市启航金属材料公司、贵州广聚源房地产开发有限公司和恒大地产集团贵阳置业提起法律诉讼。

In February, parent Evergrande had said it was in talks with Evergrande Property Services to repay the funds.翻译:今年2月，母公司恒大集团曾表示，正在与恒大物业洽谈偿还资金事宜。

In July 2022, Evergrande's chief executive and its finance head resigned after a preliminary probe found their involvement in diverting loans secured by Evergrande Property Services.翻译:2022年7月，恒大首席执行官和财务负责人因涉嫌挪用恒大物业担保贷款而辞职。

Evergrande was investigating how deposits worth 13.4 billion yuan belonging to Evergrande Property Services were used as collateral for pledge guarantees and seized by banks.翻译:恒大正在调查恒大物业的134亿元存款如何被用作质押担保的抵押品，并被银行扣押。

Evergrande Property Services has received a notice from the Guangzhou Intermediate People's Court of Guangdong Province formally accepting the filing of the case, it said on Tuesday.翻译:恒大物业周二表示，已收到广东省广州市中级人民法院正式立案的通知。

($1 = 7.1532 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1532 人民币）

item.title: 俄罗斯作为五核大国主席国将会议推迟至2024年——副部长
item.description:
Russia, current chair of the "Big Five" nuclear-armed states, will not convene any meetings this year but has presented the group with a schedule for 2024, Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov told reporters on Tuesday, according to Russian news agencies.翻译:据俄罗斯新闻机构报道，外交部副部长谢尔盖·里亚布科夫周二对记者表示，“五大”核国家现任主席国俄罗斯今年不会召开任何会议，但已向该组织提交了 2024 年的时间表。

Russia took over coordination of the group from the U.S. in August. The "Big Five" are the veto-wielding permanent members of the U.N. Security Council, and also include China, France and Britain.翻译:俄罗斯于八月从美国手中接管了该小组的协调工作。 “五巨头​​”是联合国安理会拥有否决权的常任理事国，其中还包括中国、法国和英国。

"We have outlined our proposals on the agenda and the rough schedule, and can apparently expect to receive feedback from other members of the Five," Ryabkov was quoted as saying.翻译:里亚布科夫表示：“我们已经概述了议程和粗略时间表的建议，显然可以期待收到五国其他成员的反馈。”

"But in any case, the coordinator's program will all take place next year.”翻译:“但无论如何，协调员的计划都将在明年进行。”

Reporting by Reuters; Writing by Kevin Liffey; Editing by Alison Williams翻译:路透社报道；凯文·利菲 (Kevin Liffey) 撰写；艾莉森·威廉姆斯编辑

item.title: 东北煤矿事故11人死亡 - 央视网
item.description:
Eleven people died in an accident at a coal mine in China's northeastern Heilongjiang province on Tuesday, state media outlet CCTV said.翻译:据官方媒体中央电视台报道，周二，中国东北部黑龙江省的一个煤矿发生事故，造成 11 人死亡。

The accident occurred at 3 p.m. (0700 GMT) at the Shuangyang coal mine of Heilongjiang Longmei Shuangyashan Mining Co, and is initially believed to have been caused by a rock burst, the report said.翻译:报道称，事故发生在下午3点（格林威治标准时间0700），发生在黑龙江龙煤双鸭山矿业有限公司双阳煤矿，初步认为是由岩爆引起。

The cause of the accident is under further investigation, CCTV added. Rock bursts happen when pent up energy stored in rock causes it to violently fracture.翻译:央视补充说，事故原因正在进一步调查中。当岩石中储存的被压抑的能量导致岩石剧烈破裂时，就会发生岩爆。

The report did not provide information on whether other people were still unaccounted for.翻译:该报告没有提供其他人是否仍下落不明的信息。

China's coal mines have seen a string of deadly accidents this year despite repeated government calls for stricter enforcement of safety standards, as miners seek to step up coal output.翻译:尽管政府一再呼吁严格执行安全标准，但随着矿工寻求提高煤炭产量，中国煤矿今年仍发生了一系列致命事故。

Reporting by Andrew Hayley; Editing by Edmund Klamann and Andrew Heavens翻译:安德鲁·海利报道；埃德蒙·克拉曼和安德鲁·天堂编辑

item.title: 早盘竞价：国债被吞噬，石油为欧佩克提供支撑
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

Subdued world markets were relieved at the ease with which Monday's sale of U.S. Treasuries was absorbed, but firmer oil prices ahead of the week's postponed OPEC+ meeting cut across any further decline in yields for now.翻译:周一美国国债抛售的轻松消化让低迷的世界市场松了口气，但在本周推迟的欧佩克+会议之前，油价走强，暂时阻止了收益率的进一步下跌。

Benchmark Treasury yields fell back more than 10 basis points to 4.37% after a total of $109 billion of 2 and 5-year notes hit the Street on Monday without much disruption. Another weak U.S. housing readout, with sub-forecast new home sales last month, perhaps flattered the post-auction moves.翻译:周一，总计 1090 亿美元的 2 年期和 5 年期国债在没有受到太大干扰的情况下上市，基准国债收益率回落超过 10 个基点至 4.37%。美国房地产数据的另一项疲弱表现，即上个月的新屋销售低于预期，或许令拍卖后的走势承上启下。

Either way, it helped calm any jitters about another heavy diary of debt sales - with some $39 billion of 7-year notes up for grabs later on Tuesday.翻译:不管怎样，这都有助于平息人们对另一场大规模债务销售的紧张情绪——周二晚些时候将出售约 390 亿美元的 7 年期债券。

November consumer confidence data will also be released as investors assess the mood on the High Street and online from "Black Friday" and "Cyber Monday" retail activity.翻译:11 月消费者信心数据也将发布，投资者将评估“黑色星期五”和“网络星期一”零售活动对商业街和网上的情绪。

Preliminary estimates from Adobe Digital Insights indicated that spending online on Monday was on track to reach a record $12.4 billion as bargain hunters turned out in force. The estimate, which does not account for inflation, predicts an increase of more than 9% from the $11.3 billion that shoppers spent during Cyber Monday last year.翻译:Adobe Digital Insights 的初步估计表明，随着逢低吸纳者的涌入，周一网上支出有望达到创纪录的 124 亿美元。该估算未考虑通货膨胀因素，预计消费者在去年网络星期一期间的支出将比去年的 113 亿美元增长 9% 以上。

That's likely a mixed blessing for Federal Reserve watchers - the continued buoyancy of consumption but with increasing price discrimination.翻译:对于美联储观察人士来说，这可能是喜忧参半——消费持续强劲，但价格歧视日益加剧。

With investors confident the Fed will cut rates through the second half of 2024 at least, top Fed policymakers are on the stump again Tuesday.翻译:由于投资者对美联储至少在 2024 年下半年降息充满信心，美联储高层政策制定者周二再次陷入困境。

Fed futures priced about 85bps of rate cuts through next year, starting in June, though many major banks expect even more.翻译:美联储期货定价了从 6 月份开始到明年大约 85 个基点的降息幅度，不过许多主要银行预计降息幅度会更大。

Oil prices have been a critical factor in the inflation battle of the past two years and although they retreated some 20% from highs of two months ago, traders are now watching closely for signs of further output cuts at OPEC+'s postponed meeting on Thursday - despite murmurs of rifts in the bloc.翻译:油价一直是过去两年通胀斗争中的关键因素，尽管油价较两个月前的高点回落约 20%，但交易员目前正在密切关注周四推迟的 OPEC+ 会议上进一步减产的迹象 - 尽管存在一些抱怨集团内的裂痕。

Israeli forces and Hamas fighters appeared to be abiding by a truce for a fifth morning on Tuesday, after a four-day ceasefire was extended at the last minute for at least two days to let more hostages go free.翻译:周二上午，以色列军队和哈马斯武装分子似乎第五次遵守停火协议，此前为期四天的停火协议在最后一刻被延长至少两天，以释放更多人质。

Encouraged by the retreat in debt yields, softening economic data and cooling geopolitical tensions, the dollar index (.DXY) fell back to its lowest since August and is now down 3.8% this month.翻译:受债务收益率回落、经济数据疲软和地缘政治紧张局势降温的鼓舞，美元指数(.DXY)回落至8月以来的最低水平，本月已下跌3.8%。

Stock indexes were pretty directionless, however. A modest loss in the S&P500 (.SPX) on Monday added little new impetus and futures were flat ahead of Tuesday's bell.翻译:然而，股指却相当没有方向。周一标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)的小幅下跌几乎没有带来新的推动力，周二开盘前期货持平。

It was a mixed picture in Asia and Europe too, with Hong Kong's Hang Seng (.HSI) underperforming with a loss of almost 1%.翻译:亚洲和欧洲的情况也好坏参半，香港恒生指数(.HSI)表现不佳，下跌近 1%。

There was fresh buzz about new equity sales though. Fashion company Shein has confidentially filed to go public in the United States, according to Reuters sources, in what is likely to be one of the most valuable China-founded companies to list in New York.翻译:不过，关于新股出售的话题又出现了新的热潮。据路透社消息人士透露， 时尚公司 Shein已秘密申请在美国上市，这可能是在纽约上市的最有价值的中国创办公司之一。

Elsewhere, St. Louis Fed researchers estimated the Federal Reserve will need nearly four more years to cover a historic operating loss and start sending profits again to the U.S. Treasury again.翻译:在其他地方，圣路易斯联储研究人员估计， 美联储将需要近四年的时间来弥补历史性的运营损失，并开始再次向美国财政部输送利润。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Tuesday:翻译:周二晚些时候将为美国市场提供更多方向的关键事态发展：

* U.S. Nov consumer confidence, Richmond Fed Nov business survey, Dallas Fed Nov service sector survey, Sept house prices翻译:* 美国11月消费者信心、里士满联储11月商业调查、达拉斯联储11月服务业调查、9月房价

* U.S. Treasury sells 7-year notes, 12-month bills翻译:* 美国财政部出售7年期国债、12个月期国债

* Federal Reserve Board Governor Christopher Waller, Fed Board Governor Michelle Bowman, Fed Vice Chair for Supervision Michael Barr, Chicago Fed President Austan Goolsbee all speak; European Central Bank chief Christine Lagarde and ECB chief economist Philip Lane both speak; Bank of England Deputy Governor Dave Ramsden and BoE policymaker Jonathan Haskel both speak翻译:* 美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒、美联储理事米歇尔·鲍曼、美联储监管副主席迈克尔·巴尔、芝加哥联储行长奥斯坦·古尔斯比均发言；欧洲央行行长拉加德和欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普·莱恩均发表讲话；英格兰银行副行长戴夫·拉姆斯登和英国央行政策制定者乔纳森·哈斯克尔均发表讲话

* U.S. corporate earnings: Workday, Hewlett Packard, NetApp, Crowdstrike, Splunk, Alvotech, Pinduoduo, Uxin, Canaan, Elbit, Citi Trends, Fluence Energy, Nano-X Imaging, Safe-T, Leslie's翻译:* 美国企业财报：Workday、惠普、NetApp、Crowdstrike、Splunk、Alvotech、拼多多、优信、嘉楠耘智、埃尔比特、花旗趋势、Fluence Energy、Nano-X Imaging、Safe-T、Leslie's

item.title: 一年过去了，中国的新冠抗议者陷入希望与冷漠之间
item.description:
One year after "white paper" protests flared across China against stringent COVID restrictions, Yicheng Huang fears this rare show of public dissent may eventually be forgotten by the Chinese public amid state censorship.翻译:一年前，中国各地爆发针对严格的新冠限制措施的“白皮书”抗议活动，黄义成担心，这种罕见的公开异议表现可能最终会在国家审查制度下被中国公众遗忘。

The wave of civil disobedience which erupted on Nov 25 last year was unprecedented in President Xi Jinping's decade in power, which has seen a widespread crackdown on civil society.翻译:去年11月25日爆发的公民抗命浪潮在习近平主席执政十年中是前所未有的，公民社会受到了广泛的打压。

While the protests against the zero-COVID policy were quickly suppressed by police, they helped hasten the end of three years of some of the world's strictest pandemic curbs.翻译:虽然针对零新冠政策的抗议活动很快被警方镇压，但它们帮助加速了世界上一些最严格的流行病遏制措施的三年结束。

"Many protesters experienced being part of a civic collective for the first time," said Huang, who fled to Germany in March after narrowly avoiding detention during protests in Shanghai. "For Chinese people, this is like first love."翻译:“许多抗议者第一次体验到成为公民集体的一部分，”黄说。他在上海的抗议活动中险些被拘留，并于三月份逃往德国。 “对于中国人来说，这就像初恋。”

Six participants based in China and overseas told Reuters they felt a mixture of hope and ambivalence towards the demonstrations, which they said helped to end COVID restrictions but failed to achieve lasting political change.翻译:来自中国和海外的六名参与者告诉路透社，他们对示威活动感到既希望又矛盾，他们说示威有助于结束新冠病毒限制，但未能实现持久的政治变革。

Many spoke on condition of anonymity for fear of state retribution, after last year's widespread police crackdown. Reuters was unable to confirm the total number of protesters detained last year, although some were since released.翻译:在去年警方的广泛镇压之后，由于担心国家报复，许多人都要求匿名。路透社无法确认去年被拘留的抗议者总数，尽管一些人后来被释放。

This year, on the weekend anniversary of the protests, there were no demonstrations in Beijing and Shanghai. There was also a heavy police presence at protest sites. Cities with large Chinese communities overseas, including New York, London and Washington DC, staged commemorative events.翻译:今年，在抗议活动周年纪念日的周末，北京和上海没有发生示威活动。抗议现场也有大量警察驻守。纽约、伦敦、华盛顿等海外华人社区较多的城市都举办了纪念活动。

Huang said many of his Shanghai friends walked past the main protest site to mark the anniversary, but did little else. "It's turned into a forbidden memory, like June 4th," he said, referring to the widely censored 1989 crackdown on student protesters in Tiananmen Square.翻译:黄说，他的许多上海朋友都走过主要抗议地点来纪念周年纪念日，但没有做其他事情。 “它已经变成了一种禁忌的记忆，就像 6 月 4 日一样，”他说，指的是 1989 年天安门广场上受到广泛审查的镇压学生抗议活动。

During last year's Beijing protests, some demonstrators also called for press freedom, democracy and human rights.翻译:在去年的北京抗议活动中，一些示威者还呼吁新闻自由、民主和人权。

Some of the protesters that Reuters spoke to, as well as observers, said the events helped raise awareness of how much political power Chinese people actually wielded.翻译:路透社采访的一些抗议者以及观察人士表示，这些事件有助于提高人们对中国人民实际掌握的政治权力的认识。

An Italy-based Chinese artist and blogger known as "Teacher Li", whose Twitter account became a viral conduit for protest information, told Reuters the protests "brought Chinese people's civic awareness to a new stage, and more people realised they need to stand up to protect their rights."翻译:一位被称为“李老师”的意大利华人艺术家和博主，其推特账户成为抗议信息的病毒传播渠道，他告诉路透社，抗议活动“将中国人民的公民意识提升到了一个新的阶段，更多的人意识到他们需要站起来”以保护他们的权利。”

The protests also preceded small-scale acts of subversion this year, including politically charged costumes during Halloween celebrations in Shanghai and widespread mourning over the death of former Chinese Premier Li Keqiang, who was sidelined by Xi.翻译:这些抗议活动还发生在今年的小规模颠覆活动之前，包括上海万圣节庆祝活动期间穿着带有政治色彩的服装，以及对被习近平排除在外的中国前总理李克强去世的广泛哀悼。

"I never thought that the protests would resonate so widely with people in China, where there's a high degree of monitoring," said a 30-year-old Guangzhou-based demonstrator.翻译:一名 30 岁的广州示威者表示：“我没想到抗议活动会引起如此广泛的共鸣，因为中国的监控程度很高。”

"I finally realised I'm not alone," she said. "This made me feel less pessimistic about China's future political situation, although I'm still pretty pessimistic!"翻译:“我终于意识到我并不孤单，”她说。 “这让我对中国未来的政治形势不那么悲观了，尽管我还是相当悲观！”

Other China-based participants were more ambivalent, saying they would not publicly commemorate the protests or discuss them among friends due to security concerns and a general unwillingness to revisit memories of the pandemic.翻译:其他中国参与者的态度则更为矛盾，他们表示，出于安全考虑以及普遍不愿重温这场大流行病的记忆，他们不会公开纪念这些抗议活动，也不会在朋友之间讨论这些抗议活动。

One of them, a 28-year-old Beijing tech firm employee, said she and a friend were warned by police not to take part in any activities over the weekend, even though they had not been contracted by the authorities before.翻译:其中一名 28 岁的北京科技公司员工表示，她和一名朋友被警方警告不要在周末参加任何活动，尽管她们之前并未与当局签订合同。

These warnings, and the reality of life in China, may dampen hopes for wider social change, she added.翻译:她补充说，这些警告以及中国的现实生活可能会削弱人们对更广泛的社会变革的希望。

"Even if some young first-time protesters did have a political awakening, this was probably soon overtaken by mundane concerns like the bad economy, property market and high unemployment," she said.翻译:她说：“即使一些年轻的首次抗议者确实有了政治觉醒，但这种觉醒可能很快就会被经济不景气、房地产市场和高失业率等世俗担忧所取代。”

Reporting by Laurie Chen in Beijing and Jessie Pang in Hong Kong; Additional reporting by Casey Hall, Nicoco Chan and Brenda Goh in Shanghai, and Yew Lun Tian in Beijing; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:Laurie Chen 在北京和 Jessie Pang 在香港的报道； Casey Hall、Nicoco Chan 和 Brenda Goh 在上海以及 Yew Lun Tian 在北京的补充报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑

item.title: 中国在供应链博览会上反击西方的去风险策略
item.description:
Summary:
  • China warns protectionism, geopolitical tensions threaten supply chains
  • China says wants closer supply chain ties with all
  • US, EU greenfield investment into China dropped $100 billion between 2018-2022 - study
  • US, EU 'de-risking' strategies overplay risk level - analysts
翻译:概括：
  • 中国警告保护主义、地缘政治紧张局势威胁供应链
  • 中国表示希望与所有国家建立更紧密的供应链联系
  • 研究显示，2018年至2022年间，美国和欧盟对华绿地投资减少1000亿美元
  • 分析师称美国和欧盟的“去风险”策略夸大了风险水平

China opposes protectionism and wants to strengthen supply chains with all countries, Premier Li Qiang said on Tuesday, as a growing number of nations voice concern at how much their supply chains depend on the world's second largest economy.翻译:中国总理李强周二表示，中国反对保护主义，希望加强与所有国家的供应链，越来越多的国家对其供应链对世界第二大经济体的依赖程度表示担忧。

Li's comments comes amid calls over the past year from the United States and the European Union to reduce their dependence on China in certain sectors and "de-risk" their supply chains, as well as efforts to cut off Chinese enterprises from some advanced semiconductors.翻译:李克强发表上述言论之际，美国和欧盟在过去一年中呼吁减少在某些领域对中国的依赖并“降低供应链风险” ，并努力切断中国企业对某些先进半导体的供应。

"We are willing to build closer production and industrial supply chain partnerships with all countries," Li told the first China International Supply Chain Expo (CISCE), adding that the international community needs to be "more wary of the challenges and risks brought about by protectionism and uncontrolled globalisation."翻译:李克强在首届中国国际供应链博览会上表示：“我们愿意与各国建立更紧密的生产和产业供应链伙伴关系。”他补充说，国际社会需要“更加警惕供应链带来的挑战和风险”。保护主义和不受控制的全球化。”

Recent geopolitical tensions, from Russia's war in Ukraine to concerns over a future Chinese invasion of Taiwan, have led a growing number of foreign businesses to opt against expanding their supply chains in China, instead directing investment to countries including India, Mexico and Vietnam that enjoy better ties with the United States, a strategy known as China-plus-one.翻译:最近的地缘政治紧张局势，从俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争，到对中国未来入侵台湾的担忧， 导致越来越多的外国企业选择不扩大在中国的供应链，而是将投资转向印度、墨西哥和越南等享有便利条件的国家。与美国建立更好的关系，这一战略被称为“中国加一”。

The expo, organised by the state-run China Council for the Promotion of International Trade (CCPIT), is Beijing's latest bid to increase foreign investment in China, which has dropped to historic lows.翻译:此次进博会由国营的中国国际贸易促进委员会（CCPIT）主办，是北京为增加对华外国投资而采取的最新举措，目前中国的外国投资已降至历史低点。

The value of announced U.S. and European greenfield investment into China dropped to less than $20 billion last year, from a peak of $120 billion in 2018, according to Rhodium Group, while investment into India shot up by some $65 billion or 400% between 2021 and 2022.翻译:根据荣鼎集团的数据，美国和欧洲宣布的对华绿地投资额从 2018 年 1200 亿美元的峰值降至去年的不足 200 亿美元，而对印度的投资在 2021 年至 2021 年期间猛增约 650 亿美元，即 400%。 2022 年。

Despite this decrease, China remains an attractive option: a survey conducted by HSBC bank at the China International Import Expo (CIIE) earlier this month showed 45% of firms expect to expand their supply chain in China over the next year.翻译:尽管下降，中国仍然是一个有吸引力的选择：汇丰银行本月早些时候在中国国际进口博览会（CIIE）上进行的一项调查显示，45%的企业预计明年将扩大在中国的供应链。

"I think there is a lot of hyperbole around this. And I'm not sure whether the (de-risking) measures the EU or U.S. are considering match the scale of the risk," said Dan Marks, research fellow for energy security at the Royal United Services think tank.翻译:“我认为这有很多夸张的成分。而且我不确定欧盟或美国正在考虑的（去风险）措施是否与风险的规模相匹配，”能源安全研究员丹·马克斯说。皇家联合军种智囊团。

An apparent improvement in U.S.-Sino ties, after Chinese President Xi Jinping recently met U.S. President Joe Biden and participated in the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Summit, should also help reinforce China's position as a key manufacturing hub.翻译:在中国国家主席习近平最近会见美国总统乔·拜登并参加亚太经合组织（APEC）峰会之后，中美关系明显改善，也应有助于巩固中国作为主要制造业中心的地位。

Zhang Shaogang, a CCPIT official who was part of the Chinese delegation at the APEC summit, said last week that 20% of the foreign firms exhibiting at the supply chain expo were U.S.-based, and included Amazon (AMZN.O), Apple (AAPL.O), Tesla (TSLA.O), and Intel (INTC.O).翻译:参加APEC峰会的中国代表团成员、中国贸促会官员张绍刚上周表示，参加供应链博览会的外国企业中有20%是美国企业，其中包括亚马逊(AMZN.O) 、苹果(Apple )等。 AAPL.O） 、特斯拉（TSLA.O）和英特尔（INTC.O） 。

"We wholeheartedly hope U.S. businesses can...while actively realising their own development, also positively promote the healthy, stable, and long-term development of U.S.-China relations," Zhang said.翻译:我们衷心希望美国企业在积极实现自身发展的同时，也积极推动美中关系健康稳定长期发展。

Reporting by Eduardo Baptista and Joe Cash; Editing by Jamie Freed and Miral Fahmy翻译:爱德华多·巴普蒂斯塔和乔·卡什的报道；编辑：杰米·弗里德和米拉尔·法赫米
item.author: Eduardo Baptista, Joe Cash

item.title: 中国海警警告日本船只不要进入争议海域
item.description:
The Chinese coastguard said its vessels warned off Japanese ships that "illegally intruded" into waters around disputed East China Sea islets on Tuesday.翻译:中国海警表示，其船只周二对“非法侵入”东海争议岛屿周边海域的日本船只发出警告。

The Chinese vessels "took necessary control measures", the coastguard added, without going into details. There was no immediate comment from Japan.翻译:海警补充说，中国船只“采取了必要的控制措施”，但没有透露细节。日本方面没有立即发表评论。

China urged Japan to immediately cease all "illegal activities" in the area and ensure that similar incidents do not recur, the coastguard added.翻译:中国海警补充说，中国敦促日方立即停止在该地区的一切“非法活动”，确保类似事件不再发生。

The waters around Diaoyu Islands, which Japan calls the Senkaku Islands, are disputed and claimed by both China and Japan. The two sides have faced off in the waters, deploying patrol boats and urging the other to leave the area.翻译:钓鱼岛周围海域（日本称之为尖阁诸岛）存在争议，并声称拥有主权。双方在海域对峙，派遣巡逻艇并敦促对方离开该地区。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Editing by Andrew Heavens翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；安德鲁·天堂编辑

item.title: 负债累累的全球房地产市场被迫提前销售 - M&G
item.description:
M&G Real Estate (MNG.L) forecasts it is "a matter of time" before global property markets face greater volumes of forced selling, with banks increasingly reluctant to refinance troubled or lower quality assets at current interest rates.翻译:M&G Real Estate (MNG.L)预测，全球房地产市场面临更大规模的强制抛售只是“时间问题”，银行越来越不愿意以当前利率为问题或质量较低的资产进行再融资。

Property developers in China, Germany and Sweden have in particular suffered as a result of a sharp rise in borrowing costs in recent years, with some projects financed at rock-bottom rates now close to, or breaching, key loan terms.翻译:中国、 德国和 瑞典的房地产开发商尤其因近年来借贷成本急剧上升而遭受损失，一些以最低利率融资的项目现已接近或违反了关键贷款条款。

"We had it really good in the last 25 years but now financing costs are higher and returns will have to come either from rental growth, or from adding value to properties," Jose Pellicer, head of investment strategy at M&G Real Estate said.翻译:M&G Real Estate 投资策略主管 Jose Pellicer 表示：“过去 25 年我们的情况确实不错，但现在融资成本更高，回报要么来自租金增长，要么来自房产增值。”

"We are in a new period of real estate investment that will require a new mindset," he told Reuters before the publication of the firm's Global Real Estate Outlook on Tuesday.翻译:“我们正处于房地产投资的新时期，需要新的思维方式，”他在周二发布该公司的全球房地产展望之前告诉路透社。

Pellicer said a recovery in the Chinese market would likely take time, although its troubles were cyclical rather than structural and key growth drivers like urbanisation were intact.翻译:佩利瑟表示，中国市场的复苏可能需要时间，尽管其问题是周期性的而非结构性的，而且城市化等关键增长动力完好无损。

In Europe, Germany would likely see the largest volume of forced property sales, Pellicer predicted, with the market reeling more than others from higher costs of real estate debt and a sharp repricing of assets.翻译:佩利塞预测，在欧洲，德国可能会出现最大量的强制出售房产，该市场比其他市场因房地产债务成本上升和资产急剧重新定价而受到的影响更大。

Nearly 40% of outstanding British commercial real estate loans are due to mature in 2024 and 2025, where average real estate values have fallen by over 20% since mid-2022, the report said, citing data from Bayes Business School.翻译:报告援引贝叶斯商学院的数据称，近 40% 的英国未偿商业房地产贷款将于 2024 年和 2025 年到期，自 2022 年中期以来，平均房地产价值已下降超过 20%。

Some borrowers would be unable "to meet interest coverage ratio covenants for loan renewals" and may have difficulty finding refinancing options open to them.翻译:一些借款人将无法“满足续贷的利息覆盖率契约”，并且可能难以找到向他们开放的再融资选择。

M&G, which manages 31 billion pounds ($39 billion) in property assets, said this might provide an opportunity for alternative lenders to step in.翻译:M&G 管理着 310 亿英镑（390 亿美元）的房地产资产，该公司表示，这可能为另类贷款机构介入提供了机会。

"Real estate debt is becoming an increasingly attractive investment proposition," Pellicer said.

OFFICE WOES

The global office market has been rattled by the bankruptcy of WeWork, darkening the outlook for the largest business hubs, where rising vacancies are already hitting investors.翻译:全球写字楼市场因WeWork 破产而陷入动荡，令大型商业中心的前景黯淡，这些中心的空置率上升已经给投资者带来了打击。

But not all offices are equal, Pellicer said.翻译:但佩利瑟说，并非所有办公室都是平等的。

Low-quality offices are a risky investment globally, as employees remain slow to abandon home working after the COVID-19 pandemic and buildings face costly upgrades to meet sustainability targets, the report showed.翻译:报告显示，在全球范围内，低质量的办公室是一项风险投资，因为在 COVID-19 大流行之后，员工放弃在家工作的速度仍然缓慢，而且建筑物面临着昂贵的升级以实现可持续发展目标。

The United States is in a far worse position than Asia or Europe, with downtown vacancy rates in key cities typically between 25-30% versus single digits in major European business hubs, Pellicer said.翻译:Pellicer 表示，美国的情况比亚洲或欧洲要糟糕得多，主要城市的市中心空置率通常在 25-30% 之间，而欧洲主要商业中心的空置率仅为个位数。

U.S. office-based working is at only 50% of pre-pandemic levels, the report cited real estate services firm JLL (JLL.N) as estimating, while numbers in Europe have recovered to 75%.翻译:报告援引房地产服务公司仲量联行(JLL.N)的估计，美国的办公室工作水平仅为疫情前水平的 50%，而欧洲的这一数字已恢复至 75%。

M&G said a focus on environmental, social and governance credentials and central locations was creating a market of prime, ultra-prime, and secondary space, with non-prime properties facing "significant leasing risk and weak rental prospects".翻译:M&G 表示，对环境、社会和治理资质以及中心位置的关注正在创造一个优质、超优质和次要空间市场，非优质房产面临“巨大的租赁风险和疲软的租赁前景”。

($1 = 0.8025 pounds)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.8025 英镑）

Reporting by Carolyn Cohn and Sinead Cruise; Editing by Alexander Smith翻译:卡罗琳·科恩和西尼德·克鲁斯报道；亚历山大·史密斯编辑
item.author: Sinead Cruise, Carolyn Cohn

item.title: 中国官员就东海和南海的海军行动向澳大利亚发出警告
item.description:
China has urged Australia to notify it of navy movements in the contested South China Sea and East China Sea, with a senior Chinese official cautioning that a small incident between militaries could escalate and damage ties.翻译:中国敦促澳大利亚通报其在有争议的南海和东海的海军行动，一名中国高级官员警告说，军队之间的小事件可能会升级并损害两国关系。

Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese last week said a Chinese warship acted in a dangerous manner by using its sonar during an incident with an Australian navy vessel in Japan's waters that injured a military diver.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·艾博内斯上周表示，一艘中国军舰在日本水域与一艘澳大利亚海军舰艇发生事故时使用声纳，造成一名军事潜水员受伤，这是一种危险的行为。

The same Australian vessel, Toowoomba, began joint patrols with the Philippines in the South China Sea for the first time on Saturday, amid rising tensions between Beijing and Manila over a disputed shoal.翻译:周六，在北京和马尼拉因争议浅滩问题紧张局势升级之际，同一艘澳大利亚船只“图文巴”号首次与菲律宾在南海进行联合巡逻。

Speaking in Sydney on Tuesday, the head of the international department of the Chinese Communist Party, Liu Jianchao, said the sonar incident took place in waters where there is a dispute between Japan and China, and questioned why the Australian navy was there.翻译:中共中央对外联络部部长刘建超周二在悉尼发表讲话时表示，声纳事件发生在日本和中国有争议的海域，并质疑澳大利亚海军为何出现在那里。

Liu, who denied China had harmed Australian navy personnel, called for "any kind of pre-consultations or notification" to prevent misunderstandings from happening between two militaries.翻译:刘否认中国伤害了澳大利亚海军人员，并呼吁进行“任何形式的预先磋商或通知”，以防止两军之间发生误解。

"Such small incidents could really escalate if it's not properly managed," he said, referring to public emotions. He was speaking in response to questions at an event hosted by the Australia-China Relations Institute at the University of Technology, Sydney.翻译:他在谈到公众情绪时表示：“如果处理不当，这种小事件真的可能会升级。”他是在悉尼科技大学澳中关系研究所主办的一次活动中回答问题时发表上述言论的。

Liu said the presence of Australia's navy vessels appeared to be a statement about China's policies in the South China Sea. "The reason why the Australian naval ships were there was really to contain China - so that is the message that we have been getting", he said.翻译:刘说，澳大利亚海军舰艇的出现似乎是对中国南海政策的一种声明。他说：“澳大利亚海军舰艇在那里的原因实际上是为了遏制中国，这就是我们一直得到的信息。”

He urged the Australian government and military to "act with great prudence in this area".翻译:他敦促澳大利亚政府和军方“在这一领域谨慎行事”。

Australia has previously said it respects the right of all states to exercise freedom of navigation and overflight in accordance with international law. Two-thirds of Australian trade passes through the South China Sea.翻译:澳大利亚此前曾表示，尊重所有国家根据国际法行使航行和飞越自由的权利。澳大利亚三分之二的贸易经过南海。

This month Albanese made the first visit by an Australian leader to China in seven years, after efforts by both sides to stabilize the relationship.翻译:在双方努力稳定两国关系之后，阿尔巴内斯本月进行了澳大利亚领导人七年来首次访华。

Liu said he hoped Australia could revise its screening of Chinese investment on national security factors.翻译:刘表示，希望澳大利亚能够根据国家安全因素修改对中国投资的审查。

Two rare earth investments by Chinese companies have been blocked by the Foreign Investment Review Board this year, and Australia has sought greater investment in the sector by the United States.翻译:今年中国公司的两项稀土投资已被外国投资审查委员会阻止，澳大利亚已寻求美国加大对该行业的投资。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham in Sydney; Editing by Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:Kirsty Needham 悉尼报道；编辑：拉朱·戈帕拉克里希南

item.title: 汽车业务负责人表示，华为部分汽车业务正走向独立
item.description:
Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) said some of its automotive partnerships, having gained skills in user experience, product design and marketing, were now ready to move towards independent operations and investment.翻译:华为技术有限公司 (HWT.UL) 表示，其一些汽车合作伙伴在用户体验、产品设计和营销方面获得了技能，现在已准备好转向独立运营和投资。

Huawei's managing director and chairman of its smart car solutions unit Richard Yu made the comments while speaking at a launch event in Shanghai for the Luxeed S7 sedan that Huawei has jointly developed with Chinese automaker Chery(CHERY.UL).翻译:华为董事总经理兼智能汽车解决方案部门董事长余承东在上海举行的华为与中国汽车制造商奇瑞(CHERY.UL)联合开发的Luxeed S7轿车发布会上发表讲话时发表了上述言论。

On Sunday, Huawei announced it would launch a new joint company owned up to 40% with automaker Changan Auto (SASAGG.UL).翻译:周日，华为宣布将与汽车制造商长安汽车 (SASAGG.UL) 成立一家新的合资公司，持股比例为 40%。

The Huawei-backed electric vehicle (EV) brand Aito has received more than 100,000 orders for its revamped M7 model since going on sale two-and-a-half months ago, Yu said, calling it another milestone for the company.翻译:余表示，自两个半月前上市以来，华为支持的电动汽车（EV）品牌Aito的改款M7车型已收到超过10万份订单，称这是该公司的另一个里程碑。

Huawei has repeatedly said it does not make cars on its own but only helps other automakers make better vehicles.翻译:华为多次表示，它不自己生产汽车，只是帮助其他汽车制造商生产更好的汽车。

On Tuesday, Yu said Huawei has three models for working with autos manufacturers: providing parts, providing smart solutions or designing and building vehicles.翻译:周二，余承东表示，华为与汽车制造商合作有三种模式：提供零部件、提供智能解决方案或设计和制造汽车。

Reporting by David Kirton; Editing by Jacqueline Wong翻译:大卫·科顿报道；编辑：黄杰奎琳

item.title: 中国习近平敦促在“外部风险”下加强海外法治
item.description:
President Xi Jinping has called for stronger rule of law related to foreign affairs given "external risks and challenges" as China opens up to the outside world, state media reported on Tuesday.翻译:据官方媒体周二报道，鉴于中国对外开放的“外部风险和挑战”，国家主席习近平呼吁加强与外交相关的法治。

Xi, speaking during a study session of the Communist's Party's powerful political bureau, said that to protect its overseas citizens and interests, it was necessary to deepen international cooperation on law enforcement, strengthen consular protection and assistance, and build strong rule of law.翻译:习近平在中共政治局学习时表示，保护海外公民和利益，必须深化国际执法合作，加强领事保护和协助，建设坚强法治。

China's private companies have run into legal challenges abroad in recent years, from U.S. accusations on counterfeit and pirated goods sold on online platforms owned by Tencent Holdings (0700.HK) and Alibaba Group (9988.HK), to steps to ban the TikTok video app, owned by Chinese tech firm ByteDance, in Nepal.翻译:近年来，中国私营企业在海外遭遇法律挑战，从美国指控腾讯控股（0700.HK）和阿里巴巴集团（9988.HK）旗下在线平台销售假冒盗版商品，到禁止 TikTok 视频的措施应用程序，由中国科技公司字节跳动在 尼泊尔拥有。

Xi said in the Monday speech it was necessary to raise compliance awareness and guide the public and enterprises to abide by laws, regulations and customs in the process of "going global".翻译:习近平在周一的讲话中表示，要提高合规意识，引导公众和企业在“走出去”过程中遵守法律法规和习俗。

To facilitate economic and trade exchanges, authorities say Chinese law firms have set up 180 overseas offices in 35 countries and regions, an increase of nearly 50% since 2018.翻译:为便利经贸往来，有关部门表示，中国律师事务所已在35个国家和地区设立了180个海外办事处，自2018年以来增长了近50%。

China needs to actively develop foreign-related legal services and cultivate world-class arbitration institutions and law firms, Xi said.翻译:习近平指出，我国要积极发展涉外法律服务，培育世界一流仲裁机构和律师事务所。

But authorities in some Western countries, including the U.S., Canada, Britain and the Netherlands, have accused China of illegally setting up "overseas police service centres" to monitor its overseas citizens, accusations that Beijing vehemently denies.翻译:但包括美国、加拿大、英国和荷兰在内的一些西方国家当局指责中国非法设立“海外警察服务中心”来监视其海外公民，北京方面强烈否认这一指控。

China says such centres are meant to help its citizens renew expired driving licences, and are run by Chinese volunteers, not law enforcement officers.翻译:中国表示，这些中心旨在帮助其公民更新过期的驾驶执照，并且由中国志愿者而非执法人员运营。

The call to better protect citizens abroad coincides with recent outbreaks of conflict in countries such as Ukraine and Sudan that have led to China organising evacuations of its people.翻译:在呼吁更好地保护海外公民的同时，乌克兰和苏丹等国最近爆发了冲突，导致中国组织了人员撤离。

China has organised almost 20 evacuations and dealt with more than 500,000 cases of consular protection involving millions of its people over the past decade, according to the foreign ministry.翻译:据外交部称，过去十年来，中国组织了近20次撤侨行动，处理了超过50万起领事保护案件，涉及数百万人。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 中国的Shein如何成为快时尚巨头
item.description:
China-founded fashion company Shein has confidentially filed to go public in the United States, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday.翻译:两位知情人士周一告诉路透社，中国创立的时尚公司 Shein 已秘密申请在美国上市。

Here are some key facts:

WHO IS SHEIN?

Founded by Chinese entrepreneur Chris Xu in 2012, Shein has since grown into a global fashion marketplace, serving customers in more than 150 countries and employing with more than 11,000 people, according to its website.翻译:据其网站称，Shein 由中国企业家 Chris Xu 于 2012 年创立，现已发展成为一个全球时尚市场，为 150 多个国家的客户提供服务，拥有超过 11,000 名员工。

Churning out thousands of new designs a day, Shein has a direct-selling model that targets its millions of social-media followers and makes heavy use of influencers and discount codes.翻译:Shein 每天推出数千种新设计，其直销模式针对数百万社交媒体粉丝，并大量利用影响者和折扣代码。

Shein, known for its $10 tops and $5 biker shorts, says it has more than 250 million followers on social media, and a portfolio of 10 brands including Romwe, MOTF and Cuccoo.翻译:Shein 以 10 美元的上衣和 5 美元的机车短裤而闻名，该公司表示，该公司在社交媒体上拥有超过 2.5 亿粉丝，旗下拥有 Romwe、MOTF 和 Cuccoo 等 10 个品牌。

It does not disclose its revenue publicly but sources say the company made around 100 billion yuan ($15.7 billion) in 2021.

BUSINESS MODEL

Shein produces clothing in China to sell online in the United States, Europe and Asia excluding China.翻译:Shein 在中国生产服装，并在​​美国、欧洲和亚洲（中国除外）进行网上销售。

It does not own or operate any manufacturing facilities and instead works with around 5,400 third-party contract manufacturers, mainly in China.翻译:它不拥有或经营任何制造设施，而是与大约 5,400 家第三方合约制造商合作，其中主要位于中国。

It uses an on-demand manufacturing system that allows it to quickly boost production of popular items and drop products that do not sell as expected. The process helps improve production speed and inventory management.翻译:它使用按需制造系统，使其能够快速提高受欢迎商品的产量，并放弃销售不按预期的产品。该流程有助于提高生产速度和库存管理。

Shein says the approach has helped it consistently achieve average unsold inventory rates in the low single digits.

U.S. SCRUTINY

Shein ships the majority of its products directly from China to shoppers by air in individually addressed packages.翻译:Shein 的大部分产品采用独立地址包装，通过空运直接从中国运送给购物者。

Its strategy helped the firm avoid unsold inventory piling up in warehouses and avoid import tax in the United States, one of its biggest markets, as it allows the e-tailer to take advantage of the "de minimis" provision that exempts cheap products from tariffs.翻译:其战略帮助该公司避免了未售出的库存堆积在仓库中，并避免了其最大市场之一美国的进口税，因为它允许电子零售商利用“最低限度”条款，使廉价产品免征关税。

The tax provision is now under growing congressional scrutiny, with critics saying it allowing the companies to evade higher tariffs on Chinese goods.翻译:该税收条款目前正受到国会越来越严格的审查，批评人士称，该条款允许这些公司逃避对中国商品征收的更高关税。

The decades-old tariff exemption for packages valued at $800 or less is open to all retailers but is most heavily used by Chinese firms including Shein, PDD Holding's (PDD.O) Temu and potentially by TikTok's new e-commerce business.翻译:已有数十年历史的针对价值 800 美元或以下包裹的关税豁免政策向所有零售商开放，但最常使用的是中国公司，包括 Shein、拼多多控股(PDD.O) Temu，也可能是 TikTok 的新电子商务业务。

Its online only sales strategy has helped it keep overheads down, but growing wait times - up of two weeks or more to receive goods in the U.S. - has put it at a disadvantage against rivals such as Target (TGT.N), Walmart (WMT.N) and Amazon.com (AMZN.O).翻译:其仅在线销售策略帮助其降低了管理费用，但不断增长的等待时间（在美国接收货物需要两周或更长时间）使其在与 Target (TGT.N) 、沃尔玛(WMT ) 等竞争对手相比时处于劣势.N)和 Amazon.com (AMZN.O) 。

It is now sending more low-priced apparel and home goods to U.S. warehouses to speed up shipping times, according to trade analysis firm ImportGenius.

VALUATION

The company was valued at more than $60 billion in a $2 billion private fundraising round in March, making it bigger than Swedish retailer H&M (HMb.ST) which is worth $27 billion.翻译:该公司在 3 月份的一轮 20 亿美元私募融资中估值超过 600 亿美元，超过瑞典零售商 H&M (HMb.ST)的估值 270 亿美元。

At that valuation, Shein would still trail Uniqlo owner Fast Retailing's (9983.T) $80 billion valuation and Zara owner Inditex's (ITX.MC) $126 billion.翻译:按照这一估值，Shein 仍落后于优衣库所有者迅销集团 (Fast Retailing ) (9983.T) 的800 亿美元估值和 Zara 所有者 Inditex (ITX.MC)的 1,260 亿美元估值。

Shein moved its headquarters to Singapore from Nanjing, capital of China's eastern Jiangsu province, around late 2021, a shift that analysts said helps the firm circumvent China's tough new rules on overseas listings.翻译:Shein 于 2021 年底左右将总部从中国东部江苏省省会南京迁至新加坡，分析师表示，这一转变有助于该公司规避中国对海外上市的严格新规定。

Reporting by Miyoung Kim; Editing by Stephen Coates翻译:Miyoung Kim 报道；斯蒂芬·科茨编辑

item.title: 西方的去风险化举措开始损害中国的前景
item.description:
Summary:
  • China records first quarterly foreign direct investment deficit
  • Execs worry about China slowdown, geopolitics, regulations
  • Trend could weigh on yuan, chip away at growth potential-analyst
  • China-focused buyout fundraising has ground to a halt-data
翻译:概括：
  • 中国首次出现季度外国直接投资赤字
  • 高管担心中国经济放缓、地缘政治和监管
  • 分析师称，趋势可能会对人民币造成压力，削弱增长潜力
  • 以中国为重点的收购融资已陷入停滞数据

U.S. furniture company head Jordan England thinks his firm's Chinese suppliers are among the best in the game, but geopolitics and a slowing economy have pushed him to source more products from Southeast Asia, Eastern Europe and Mexico.翻译:美国家具公司负责人乔丹·英格兰认为，他的公司的中国供应商是业内最好的供应商之一，但地缘政治和经济放缓迫使他从东南亚、东欧和墨西哥采购更多产品。

"I'm looking to move away from it (China)," said England, CEO and co-founder of Florida-based Industry West.翻译:总部位于佛罗里达州的 Industry West 的首席执行官兼联合创始人 England 表示：“我正在寻求离开（中国）。”

"It was always 'China plus one,'" he said, referring to the diversification strategy many businesses began implementing after Washington imposed trade tariffs on Beijing in 2018 to ensure they were not wholly dependent on Chinese suppliers.翻译:“总是‘中国加一’，”他说，指的是2018年华盛顿对北京征收贸易关税后，许多企业开始实施多元化战略，以确保它们不完全依赖中国供应商。

Now "it's like 'plus-10' and then China," he added, with the latter down to providing half of Industry West's products and being trimmed more.翻译:现在“就像‘+10’，然后是中国，”他补充道，后者减少到提供工业西部一半的产品，并进行了更多削减。

Foreign investors have been sour on China for most of this year, but data released over the past month has provided clear evidence of the negative impact de-risking strategies are having on the world's second-largest economy.翻译:今年大部分时间里，外国投资者一直对中国感到不满，但过去一个月发布的数据清楚地证明了去风险策略对世界第二大经济体产生的负面影响。

Activity surveys showed manufacturing unexpectedly contracted in October, while exports accelerated their decline. China recorded its first-ever quarterly deficit in foreign direct investment in July-September, suggesting capital outflow pressure.翻译:活动调查显示，10 月份制造业意外收缩，而出口则加速下滑。中国7-9月外国直接投资首次出现季度逆差，显示资本外流压力。

Nicholas Lardy, senior researcher at the Peterson Institute for International Economics, said in a note the new data imply that foreign firms are not only declining to reinvest earnings, but are selling existing investments and repatriating funds.翻译:彼得森国际经济研究所高级研究员尼古拉斯·拉迪在一份报告中表示，新数据表明外国公司不仅拒绝将收益再投资，而且正在出售现有投资并将资金汇回国内。

This trend could further weaken the yuan and clip China's economic growth potential, he added.翻译:他补充说，这种趋势可能会进一步削弱人民币并削弱中国的经济增长潜力。

"In recent years, the scale, proportion and growth rate of foreign investment absorbed by China have all remained at a relatively high level," He Yadong, a Chinese commerce ministry spokesperson, said in response to a question from Reuters.

LONG-TERM PROSPECTS

Businesses have longstanding worries about geopolitics, tightening regulations and a more favourable playing field for state-owned companies. But for the first time in the four decades since China opened up to foreign investments, executives are now also concerned about long-term growth prospects.翻译:企业界长期以来对地缘政治、监管收紧以及国有企业更有利的竞争环境感到担忧。但自中国向外国投资开放四十年来，高管们首次对长期增长前景表示担忧。

A survey released last week by The Conference Board, a think tank, showed more than two-thirds of the CEOs who responded said China's demand has not returned to pre-COVID levels, with 40% expecting a decrease in capital investments in the country over the next six months and a similar proportion expecting to cut jobs.翻译:智库世界大型企业联合会上周发布的一项调查显示，超过三分之二的受访首席执行官表示，中国的需求尚未恢复到新冠疫情爆发前的水平，其中 40% 的受访者预计中国的资本投资将在未来六个月，预计裁员的比例类似。

China is outwardly confident about growth despite a global economic slowdown, with policy advisers favouring a target of about a 5% expansion of gross domestic product in 2024 and the country aiming to double the economy's size by 2035.翻译:尽管全球经济放缓，但中国表面上对增长充满信心，政策顾问支持2024年国内生产总值增长约5%的目标，并计划到2035年将经济规模扩大一倍。

But England said he is concerned about how his Chinese suppliers that also produce for the domestic market will cope with the country's severe property market downturn.翻译:但英格兰表示，他担心同样为国内市场生产的中国供应商将如何应对该国严重的房地产市场低迷。

"I'm worried about these factories going from 500 workers to 200, to 100," he said.

OPEN FOR BUSINESS?

Premier Li Qiang's overtures declaring China open for business to foreign investors after the pandemic have been greeted with scepticism in some Western boardrooms in light of a broader anti-espionage law, raids on consultancies and due diligence firms and exit bans, trade bodies say.翻译:贸易机构表示，鉴于更广泛的反间谍法、对咨询公司和尽职调查公司的突击检查以及出境禁令，疫情后李强总理宣布中国向外国投资者开放的提议遭到了一些西方董事会的怀疑。

Li is expected to make a similar call on Tuesday at the country's inaugural China International Supply Chain Expo, which it is expected to use to tout its supply chain advantages.翻译:预计李克强将于周二在中国首届中国国际供应链博览会上发表类似的讲话，预计中国将利用该博览会宣传其供应链优势。

"Foreign business executives here are eager to continue in China," AmCham President Michael Hart said. "But boards back in the U.S. are wary."翻译:“这里的外国企业高管渴望继续在中国发展，”美国商会主席迈克尔·哈特说。 “但美国的董事会对此持谨慎态度。”

European firms have raised fair competition concerns about state-directed lending to Chinese manufacturers, while Noah Fraser, managing director of the Canada China Business Council, said "bad blood" remains over the detention of two Canadians from 2018 to 2021.翻译:欧洲公司对国家向中国制造商提供的贷款提出了公平竞争担忧，而加中贸易理事会董事总经理诺亚·弗雷泽(Noah Fraser)表示，2018年至2021年两名加拿大人被拘留的问题仍然存在“不和”。

In private equity, while Asia-focused funds have allocated capital to China, data from Preqin shows that as of Nov. 24, no China-focused buyout fund had been raised in 2023 in any currency, compared with $210 million in 2022 and $13.2 billion in 2019, before the pandemic.翻译:在私募股权领域，虽然专注于亚洲的基金已向中国配置资金，但Preqin的数据显示，截至11月24日，2023年没有以任何货币筹集专注于中国的收购基金，而2022年为2.1亿美元，2022年为132亿美元。 2019年，疫情爆发之前。

Primavera Capital founder Fred Hu cites mounting macroeconomic uncertainty, a "murky capital market outlook," and lingering concerns over past regulatory crackdowns on high-growth industries such as technology and education.翻译:春华资本创始人胡祖六表示，宏观经济不确定性不断增加、“资本市场前景黯淡”，以及对过去对科技和教育等高增长行业的监管打压的持续担忧。

"Tech firms and other private enterprises must be able to tap public markets for financing and liquidity, so the current market conditions in China do considerable harm to the real economy," said Hu, adding China-focused private equity firms were diverting capital to Southeast Asia, Australia and Europe.翻译:胡说：“科技公司和其他私营企业必须能够利用公共市场进行融资和流动性，因此中国目前的市场状况对实体经济造成了相当大的损害。”他补充说，专注于中国的私募股权公司正在将资金转移到东南部亚洲、澳大利亚和欧洲。

Despite the challenges, foreign investment flows are not unidirectional. Many firms, especially in the retail sector, still target China's giant market. McDonald's (MCD.N) said last week it had struck a deal to boost its stake in its China business.翻译:尽管面临挑战，外国投资流动并不是单向的。许多公司，尤其是零售行业的公司，仍然瞄准中国这个巨大的市场。麦当劳(MCD.N)上周表示，已达成一项协议，以增持其在中国业务的股份。

An executive at a European hotel chain, who spoke on condition of anonymity due to the topic's sensitivity, said his firm was happy to reinvest profits in China for now.翻译:一位欧洲连锁酒店的高管表示，他的公司目前很乐意将利润再投资到中国。由于该话题的敏感性，该高管要求匿名。

"We know what's going on politically and yes, economically," he said, adding the latest data "was nothing to be proud of."翻译:他说：“我们知道政治上正在发生什么，是的，经济上也发生了什么事。”他补充说，最新数据“没有什么值得骄傲的”。

"It's slow, but only warrants taking a 'wait and see approach.'"翻译:“虽然速度很慢，但只能采取‘观望态度’。”

item.title: 马来西亚MH370客机失踪中国家属向法庭寻求赔偿
item.description:
A Beijing court on Monday began compensation hearings for the Chinese relatives of passengers on board Malaysia Airlines flight MH370, which mysteriously disappeared over the Indian Ocean almost a decade ago, the plaintiffs said.翻译:原告称，北京一家法院周一开始为马来西亚航空公司 MH370 航班乘客的中国亲属举行赔偿听证会，该航班近十年前在印度洋神秘失踪。

Over 150 Chinese passengers were on the flight which vanished en route from Kuala Lumpur to Beijing on March 8, 2014. Malaysian investigators did not rule out the possibility that the aircraft had been deliberately taken off course, and debris confirmed or believed to be from the aircraft has washed up along the coast of Africa and on islands in the Indian Ocean.翻译:2014 年 3 月 8 日，这架航班在从吉隆坡飞往北京的途中失踪，机上载有 150 多名中国乘客。马来西亚调查人员不排除飞机被故意偏离航线的可能性，残骸已确认或相信来自飞机。飞机被冲到非洲海岸和印度洋岛屿上。

Relatives of these passengers said they were demanding compensation from Malaysia Airlines, Boeing, aircraft engine maker Rolls-Royce and Allianz insurance group among others.翻译:这些乘客的亲属表示，他们要求马来西亚航空、波音公司、飞机发动机制造商劳斯莱斯和安联保险集团等提供赔偿。

The court did not release any details on the case, but state media said more than 40 relatives were seeking between 10 million and 80 million yuan ($1.4 million and $11.2 million) each in compensation.翻译:法院没有公布该案的任何细节，但官方媒体称，40 多名亲属正在寻求每人 1000 万至 8000 万元人民币（140 万美元至 1120 万美元）的赔偿。

Malaysia Airlines, Rolls-Royce, Allianz and Boeing did not immediately respond to requests for comment.翻译:马来西亚航空、劳斯莱斯、安联和波音没有立即回应置评请求。

Holding up signs saying "resume the search" and "re-establish an international investigation team", Jiang Hui, a spokesperson for the bereaved families, said Malaysia Airlines left them with no choice but to go to court to seek answers.翻译:遇难者家属发言人江辉举着“恢复搜寻”和“重新成立国际调查组”的牌子，表示马航让他们别无选择，只能上法庭寻求答案。

"'We are not responsible anymore' is their attitude," said Jiang, whose mother was on board.翻译:“‘我们不再负责’是他们的态度，”蒋的母亲在船上。

There was a heavy police presence outside Chaoyang District People's Court in Beijing before the hearing, with reporters cordoned off and unable to interact with the family members.翻译:开庭前，北京朝阳区人民法院外戒备森严，记者被封锁，无法与家属互动。

Some of the relatives, who spoke to reporters after the hearing, said they wanted the resumption of search efforts and for Malaysia Airlines to directly communicate with them as well as to provide them with psychological counselling.翻译:一些在听证会后接受记者采访的亲属表示，他们希望恢复搜寻工作，并希望马航能够直接与他们沟通，并为他们提供心理咨询。

Many said these demands were more important than the monetary compensation.翻译:许多人表示，这些要求比金钱补偿更重要。

"My mother died last year and she brought up my son. Until the very end I hid from her what really happened to him," said Beijing resident Bao Lanfang, 71, who lost her son and daughter-in-law on board. She said her husband had recently died after suffering from severe depression because of the incident.翻译:“我的母亲去年去世了，她抚养了我的儿子。直到最后我才向她隐瞒了他的真实情况，”71岁的北京居民鲍兰芳说，她在船上失去了儿子和儿媳。她说，她的丈夫因这起事件而患上严重抑郁症，最近去世了。

In March, another group of relatives urged the Malaysian government to allow U.S. seabed exploration firm Ocean Infinity to mount a new search for the missing plane.翻译:今年三月，另一群亲属敦促马来西亚政府允许美国海底勘探公司 Ocean Infinity 对失踪飞机进行新的搜索。

Reporting by Laurie Chen; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:陈劳瑞报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑
